headline: BofA treating gov't. shutdown like natural disaster: CEO
summary: Bank of America has a playbook for government shutdowns, which includes providing fee and payment waivers as well as loan deferrals and forbearance programs, CEO Brian Moynihan said at the American Bankers Association's annual convention.

raw.headline: BofA treating gov't. shutdown like natural disaster: CEO
raw.summary: Bank of America has a playbook for government shutdowns, which includes providing fee and payment waivers as well as loan deferrals and forbearance programs, CEO Brian Moynihan said at the American Bankers Association's annual convention.

headline: Holiday Tradition Continues: BofA "More Rewards Day" Bonuses Approaching $100 Million
summary: Bank of America announced its fourth annual More Rewards Day, taking place on Thursday, November 6, 2025. As the holiday season kicks off, BofA is offering Consumer and Business credit cardholders one full day to earn bonus rewards on their purchases. Bank of America credit cardholders are on pace to earn a total of $100 million in extra rewards since the inception of More Rewards Day, having already earned $74 million during the first three annual events.

raw.headline: Holiday Tradition Continues: BofA "More Rewards Day" Bonuses Approaching $100 Million
